name: Slumber
description:
Sleepy boy is stuck in an endless dream and needs to get out. 

Controls

  • R to restart level
  • Left Click or Right Click to drop an orb
  • ESC to bring up the window and switch to windowed mode

Orbs react to objects of the same colour. Enemies will sleep when they are near an orb of the same colour.

I would love to hear your feedback! You can follow me on twitter @Cole_Knapp

Donations are appreciated and help me continue to build more projects and advance in game development. 

Thanks to Katie Neil for helping with level design and art.

Music from https://filmmusic.io:
"Magic Scout Cottages" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
